job_description:
Company: NextGenSystems
Position: AI Research Engineer
Location: Remote
Salary: $140,000 - $220,000

About Us:
NextGenSystems is a cutting-edge technology company focused on developing advanced artificial intelligence solutions.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative AI Research Engineer to join our team. This role will involve designing, implementing, and evaluating new AI algorithms and models.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct original research in AI and machine learning.
- Develop and prototype novel AI algorithms and models.
- Publish research findings in top-tier conferences and journals.
- Collaborate with other researchers and engineers to integrate research into products.

Requirements:
- PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
- Strong background in mathematics, statistics, and probability.
- Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
- Experience with natural language processing (NLP) or computer vision.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with reinforcement learning.
- Experience with distributed training and deployment of large-scale models.

Benefits:
- World-class compensation and benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on groundbreaking research.
- Flexible work environment with remote options available.
